name: Arena of Rewind
description:
Arena of Rewind is 2d shooter. You need to fight with enemies until portal appear,then you go back in time and play same level , but in previous era (for example medieval).Your character,weapons,enemies and enviroment will change to something, that suits to specific era. Game made for Brackeys GameJam.

Controls : 

wsad - move

1 2 3 - choose weapon
